info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:27PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wheatland, southwestern Golden Valley, northern Sweet Grass and northern Park Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles northwest of Harlowton to 19 miles northeast of Clyde Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlowton, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Judith Gap, Shawmut, Twodot and Melville. Expect a brief period of strong crosswinds on Highway 191 between Judith Gap and Melville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
